mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_img(user_id, img_name, img_size, img_type, img_data) VALUES(#{userId}, #{imgName}, #{imgSize}, #{imgType}, #{imgData})
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw}, email = #{email} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_detail (user_id, name, birth, gender, addr1, addr2, addr3, tel) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{tel})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member_detail WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from member where user_id = #{userId} and pw = #{pw}
